title: Large wholesale stores having built-up area of more than 500 sq
clause_text: Large wholesale stores having built-up area of more than 500 sq.mt., car dealer showrooms, warehouses / storages, auto service centres, Garages etc. shall not be permissible in TOD zone. Provision of Inclusive housing shall not be applicable in TOD zone.
section: Incentive for providing Public Parking in the area falling within the radius of 200 m. from the Metro / MRTS Station.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
